article.title: Iraq Purchases Goodrich Surveillance Pods for F-16s
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Goodrich Surveillance and Reconnaissance Systems, Westford, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $71,450,000 firm fixed price, time and materials, and cost reimbursable, undefinitized contract action/letter contract for the procurement and deployment of four DB-110 reconnaissance pod systems for use on the F-16 C/D Block 50/52 being purchased by the government of Iraq.Â The contracting activity is Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
